# How-to create Personal Access Tokens {#sec-personal-access-tokens}

To facilitate pull Git repositories to the remote servers, we recommend create personal access tokens.

## GitLab

Access <https://git.gesis.org/-/profile/personal_access_tokens>.

![Screenshot of GitLab's Personal Access Tokens form.](../img/gitlab-personal-access-tokens.png)

Provide a `Token name` like `Remote machines at GESIS` and select only the `read_repository` scope.

Save the token as you won't be able to access it again.
